CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV escorts MOT and CHI into observation room and explains Warm-Up Activity . MOT holds CHI in her arms
MOT puts CHI down on the floor
CHI reaches up for the door knob and looks at MOT
MOT quickly gestures toward chair next to door
MOT puts her bag down on the chair
<aft> MOT turns to toys on the floor
CHI turns and looks at the toys on the floor
MOT walks over to toys and kneels down
MOT grabs jack+in+the+box and places it in front of CHI
CHI walks over and picks up football which is lying beside jack+in+the+box
CHI holds the ball up and looks down at the floor
MOT holds out her hands palms facing upward
CHI hurls football to the floor forcefully
CHI takes a few steps forward and picks up rubber duck from the floor
CHI is looking at rubber duck in his hands
CHI turns his head and looks at toys on the floor behind him
MOT tosses football in her hand up in the air and catches it
MOT leans forward and looks into CHI's face
CHI hands rubber duck to MOT
CHI looks towards the table not at MOT
MOT takes rubber duck from CHI
MOT looks at football in her hands
MOT holds up the ball and looks at CHI
CHI looks at the ball in MOT's hand
CHI takes a few steps towards MOT
MOT pretends to throw the football to CHI several times but does not let it leave her hand
CHI squats and leans over the jack+in+the+box
MOT gently lays football down on the floor next to her
MOT turns jack+in+the+box around so that handle faces CHI
MOT grabs jack+in+the+box handle turns jack+in+the+box more toward herself and begins to turn the handle
MOT taps CHI's hand then points to handle
CHI puts his hand on the handle
MOT places her hand over CHI's and turns the handle
after a few turns CHI pulls his hand away and then tries to turn the handle by himself
<aft> MOT turns jack+in+the+box toward herself and turns handle
CHI drops to the floor next to MOT
CHI watches MOT then looks up towards the wall
clown pops up out of jack+in+the+box
CHI reaches out and grabs clown
MOT holds jack+in+the+box closer to CHI and watches CHI
CHI pulls on the clown bringing the jack+in+the+box closer to him
MOT pulls jack+in+the+box away from CHI
MOT sets jack+in+the+box on floor and pushes clown inside it
MOT watches CHI as she turns handle
CHI jerks forward slightly . CHI looks at the clown
<aft> MOT pushes clown back into box and closes lid
MOT slides jack+in+the+box in front of CHI
CHI grabs handle and attempts to turn it
MOT sits on the floor pushing the toy duck and the football out of her way
CHI turns the handle once briefly
MOT motions to jack+in+the+box with her head
CHI sits motionless facing the jack+in+the+box
CHI's face is not in camera view
MOT pulls the jack+in+the+box closer to her and turns handle
rubber duck squeaks as MOT's knee comes down on it
CHI immediately tries to push the clown back in the jack+in+the+box
MOT gestures pushing downward with her hand
CHI picks up jack+in+the+box and holds it out to MOT
<bef> CHI picks up football lying on the floor
CHI holds up the football and looks at MOT
MOT puts jack+in+the+box on the floor next to her
CHI turns and looks at jack+in+the+box then back towards the wall opposite him
MOT picks up rubber duck from the floor and begins to squeeze it in front of CHI
CHI slowly turns to looks at MOT
<bef> CHI looks down at the ball then up at MOT briefly
<aft> CHI leans over and forcefully throws football into MOT's lap
MOT takes football and holds it in her hands
CHI crawls over to book lying on the floor and picks it up and puts it on his lap
CHI turns and looks at MOT
MOT is looking at her finger which has a splint on it
MOT is fidgeting with her finger
<aft> CHI looks down at the book
CHI looks down at the book
CHI looks down at the page then turns around and looks at MOT
MOT opens her mouth wide and looks at CHI
CHI points to picture in the book
MOT plays with football in her hand
<bef> CHI turns and looks at small chair next to him against wall
<bef> CHI reaches up on the chair then retracts his hand
CHI crawls over to toy car lying on the floor in front of him
CHI picks up toy car and places it in front of MOT
MOT looks down at the car
CHI walks over to small chair and begins to climb onto it then grabs chair and tilts it toward himself
CHI looks at MOT briefly then back at the chair
CHI lets go of the chair
CHI starts to pick up chair and drag it
CHI moves the chair a little further
MOT mostly out of camera view
CHI leans his head over the back of the chair and looks intently at MOT
MOT points to table against adjacent wall
CHI leans over chair and stares at MOT
CHI looks up at the table
CHI pushes the chair into the table
CHI looks down at the seat of the chair
CHI walks around table and sticks his head underneath it
camera makes noise as it moves
CHI looks up at something across the room
CHI looks under the table again and then turns back toward MOT
CHI bends down and peeks into slightly opened drawer of desk
CHI tries to reach into drawer
<2-3> MOT motions to restrain CHI with her hand but then draws back
CHI stares down into the drawer
<1-3> MOT looks up at the clock . <4-7 .> MOT looks at CHI
<aft> MOT tosses football in her hands
<aft> MOT glances up at camera then watches CHI
CHI's actions are out of camera view
CHI attempts to turn jack+in+the+box handle
MOT reaches over and touches CHI's hand
CHI pushes clown back into jack+in+the+box
CHI still out of camera view
MOT glances up at table top then looks at CHI
INV explains Small Scale Activity to MOT
INV leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place
INV re-enters the room and explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT
INV has MOT sit next to CHI at the table . INV gives CHI the jewelry box toy to hold
INV opens the drawer with the Forbidden Object in it
CHI leans over and looks in the drawer
INV takes the forbidden object out of the drawer
CHI reaches out for the object
<$=1> INV puts the object on the table and holds it there
MOT is watching CHI stare at object
MOT jerks forward to restrain CHI
MOT leans over CHI shifting her gaze from CHI to Forbidden Object
INV sets the object in motion
CHI stares at object and smiles
CHI reaches out to touch object
MOT opens and closes the jewelry box in her hand left
MOT leans close to CHI and looks at the object
MOT holds jewelry box out to CHI and moves it
CHI bends the part of the object he is holding and putting one of the balls on end of the object in his mouth
MOT waves the jewelry box at CHI
CHI lets go of the object
CHI retracts his hand but still stares at the object
MOT looks down at CHI and grimaces
CHI bends the object towards MOT
CHI looks at the part of the object in his hand
MOT shakes her head and looks down at the table top
CHI holds part of the object in front of MOT and looks at MOT
MOT puts jewelry case on the table and grasps CHI's hand forcefully
CHI attempts to put tip of object into his mouth
MOT forcefully tries to pull object away from CHI's mouth
CHI lets go of the object
CHI moves his hand back and forth making the object vibrate
CHI brushes his hand back and forth causing the object to sway back and forth
CHI is forcefully brushing his hand on the object
MOT leans back in chair and raises hands upward then watches CHI as he plays with object
INV abruptly pulls object off of the table
CHI reaches out for object in INV's hands
INV sets object back unto table
INV again pulls object off of table and away from CHI
CHI forcefully runs his hand over the beads of the tree
INV moves object away from CHI
CHI stretches his arm reaching out for object which INV now has close to her chest
<bef> INV sets object back on table
CHI reaches for beads on object and puts one in his mouth
MOT reaches out to restrain CHI
MOT pushes CHI's hands downward and the beads out of his mouth
INV removes object from table and puts it back in the drawer
INV explains PCI Activities and then leaves
MOT picks up box containing ball from the desk
CHI looks up at MOT and reaches for box
CHI walks over to the box
CHI looks inside the box and reaches in it
MOT places box containing ball on her knees and looks into it
CHI takes the ball out of box
CHI holds the ball and looks down at it
MOT puts the box on top of chair
CHI's back is to the camera
<aft> MOT reaches out to the desk
the ball rolls towards the desk
MOT stretches out her hands then grabs ball
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
ball curves away from CHI as it rolls
CHI reaches over and grabs the ball
MOT puts her hands out palms up and looks at CHI
CHI holds the ball and looks at MOT briefly
CHI bounces ball on the floor
MOT rolls the ball herself then throws it up in the air and catches it
CHI stands up and walks over to box on the chair
MOT holds out ball to CHI and watches CHI
CHI looks into the box the turns and looks at the ball
CHI throws the box on the floor
CHI takes ball from MOT's hands
CHI looks at the ball briefly
CHI picks up the box and puts ball in it
CHI tries to lift ball out of box
the ball is stuck in the box
CHI holds the ball and box up a nd looks at MOT
CHI shakes ball loose from box
MOT watches CHI and puts her hands out
CHI throws the ball down on the floor
ball bounces of off the box and rolls into the corner of the room
<bef> MOT puts down the box and MOT picks up ball
MOT looks at CHI and holds the ball out to him
CHI picks up empty box and brings it to MOT
CHI looks at MOT and motions to the box
MOT holds out ball and looks at CHI
CHI pulls ball from MOT's hand into the box
CHI bends down and looks at the ball
CHI falls to the floor with the box
CHI sits on floor and tips the box upside down
the ball is stuck in the box
CHI tries to pull the ball out of the box
MOT picks up her canvas bag from off of the floor and puts it up on the chair then repositions herself next to CHI
CHI tries to pull the ball out of the box
CHI tries to pull the ball out of the box
MOT turns CHI around on the floor so he is facing camera
CHI slides ball out of box
the ball goes back in the box
CHI pulls the ball out of the box
CHI holds the ball in his lap and look down at it
MOT takes empty box and lays it on the floor
CHI looks at ball in his hands
the ball bounces off of CHI
the ball rolls off of CHI's lap
CHI looks down at the ball
MOT slides the box close to CHI
MOT puts box containing ball on desk
MOT takes another box down from the desk
MOT places the box on the floor between herself and CHI
CHI starts to lift up cover of the box
MOT helps CHI lift up cover
CHI picks towel up out of box and puts it on the floor near MOT
MOT leans down and looks at CHI
<$=1> MOT holds towel up in front of her face
CHI stares blankly and then looks up at MOT
<bef> MOT peeks out from side of towel
CHI puts his hand down on the box
MOT holds the towel in front of her face
CHI crawls over empty boxes lying on the floor
CHI grabs the cover of the box
<bef> MOT holds up towel in front of her face . MOT lowers the towel
MOT leans forward and looks at CHI
CHI looks at MOT and holds the box
MOT holds towel out between CHI and herself
MOT peeks over the top of the towel
CHI stands up and walks over to MOT
MOT lifts up the towel and then lowers it again
CHI takes towel and slides it over his head
CHI pulls towel down off of his head
MOT shakes her head as she leans forward and looks into CHI's face
CHI looks down at the towel
CHI holds up towel in front of his face and takes a few steps back
CHI lowers towel to the floor slowly and takes a few steps back
CHI looks down at the towel
MOT picks towel up from off of the floor
CHI stares down at the floor
<aft> MOT throws towel on top of CHI's head
CHI pulls towel off of his head
CHI stands holding the towel and looking down at the floor
CHI turns his head abruptly and looks at MOT
CHI walks over to MOT and starts to put towel on top of MOT's head
MOT assists CHI by pulling towel over her head
MOT shakes her head slightly and faces CHI
CHI looks under the towel at MOT
MOT peers out from underneath towel
CHI slides towel from the top of MOT's head onto top of his own head
CHI takes a few steps back
MOT looks at CHI swaying from side to side
CHI throws towel off of his head and onto floor
<aft> CHI turns and looks up at the wall
MOT turns over box bottom lying on the floor
MOT starts to fold up towel and place in box
MOT puts box on top of desk
MOT takes box down from desk and lays it on floor in front of CHI
MOT takes cover off of box
CHI looks down at the contents of the box
MOT slides the box closer to CHI
CHI squats down and picks up a crayon from the box
MOT ruffles the papers in the box
CHI holds the crayon up near his mouth and looks down at the paper
MOT taps the paper in the box
CHI hands the crayon to MOT
MOT takes red crayon from CHI
CHI takes the paper that MOT drew on and puts it in empty box cover lying next to him on floor
CHI loses his balance then sits clumsily on the floor
CHI puts the paper on the floor in front of him and begins to draw on it
MOT turns a paper in the box over
MOT reads the paper in the box
MOT reads the paper in the box
CHI turns paper over and starts drawing on other side
MOT turns gaze back to CHI and leans over him
CHI leans in box cover and lifts it up
CHI starts drawing with another crayon
MOT draws on the corner of paper
MOT points to her drawing with the crayon
CHI stops drawing then hands crayon to MOT
CHI crawls over to box and picks up another crayon
MOT watches CHI and holds a crayon out to him
<bef> CHI starts to draw . CHI stops drawing and puts the paper in the box
<$=1> MOT motions to the paper with the crayon
CHI takes a paper out of the box and puts it on the floor
MOT slides the paper over and puts it on top of the other one on the floor
CHI takes two papers out of the box and puts one of them down near MOT and puts the other on his lap
CHI bangs a crayon down on the paper on his leg
the crayon rolls to the floor
CHI picks up both papers and puts on in front of him and tosses the other off to the side
MOT watches CHI still holding the crayon out to him
CHI crawls on top of the papers and picks up a crayon from the floor
CHI takes the crayon from MOT's hand
MOT holds out the crayon and looks at CHI
CHI picks up red crayon and draws
CHI's back is to the camera
MOT draws on the paper briefly
CHI points down at the crayon in MOT's hand
CHI glances over at the desk
CHI's back is to the camera
<$=1> MOT takes another piece of paper out of the box
MOT starts to write on the paper
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
CHI turns away from MOT and walks towards the desk
CHI looks up at the desk
CHI reaches up for box on the desk
MOT drops crayon into the box
MOT reaches up and restrains CHI from taking the next box down
CHI turns and looks at MOT
<$=3> MOT puts papers and crayons in box
CHI looks down at the papers on the floor
MOT puts a paper in the box
MOT points to a piece of paper on the floor and looks at CHI
CHI walks over and picks up the paper and walks towards MOT with it
CHI puts the paper in the box
MOT helps CHI lay paper in the box
CHI stands up and starts to walk away
MOT points to crayons and then to box
CHI stares down at the box
MOT puts one crayon in the box
CHI puts crayon in his hand into the box
MOT points to crayon on the floor
CHI reaches down to pick up crayon and falls on the floor accidentally
MOT slides box closer to CHI
CHI drops crayon into the box
MOT puts the box on the floor
CHI looks down at the box
CHI squats down and picks up book
CHI holds the book and looks down at it
MOT slides empty box and cover away from her
CHI holds book out to MOT
MOT holds her hand with palm upward to CHI
CHI starts to crawl into MOT's lap
<aft> MOT lifts CHI into her lap and holds out book in front of them
CHI points to a picture in the book
MOT points to picture in book
CHI is looking at pictures in book
<$=1> MOT points to the picture and looks at CHI
CHI starts to turn the page
CHI looks down at the picture as he pulls his hand back
MOT leans her mouth next to CHI's ear
CHI looks at the opposite page
MOT points to picture on opposite page
MOT starts to turn the page
CHI points to picture and stops the page from turning
CHI looks at the next two pages
CHI points to picture of owls . CHI looks at the picture of owls
CHI tries to turn the page
MOT hugs the CHI with one hand around his waist
CHI starts to turn the page
CHI rocks back and forth looking at the book
CHI is looking at the book
<aft> CHI tries to turn the page
MOT turns back to first page of the book
MOT tilts the book back and forth
CHI tries to get out of MOT's embrace
MOT inserts her hand under CHI's sweatshirt
CHI wriggles out of MOT's lap
CHI walks to desk and reaches for objects on top of it
